item.title: Shannon add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "Pulling heads off Barbies, sticking them on the TV antenna and ruining the reception. But thats how witch babies are." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "He was getting that look he gets, oh boy, like Here comes Moses tromping down off of Mount Syanide with ten fresh ways to wreck your life." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "I would like to be the air that inhabits you for a moment only. I would like to be that unnoticed and that necessary." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Julie Klausner
item.description: "Pam (from The Office) is not intimidating, like one of those women who wears makeup and tailored clothes, and has a good job that she enjoys, and confidence, and an adult woman's sexuality. There's nothing scary about Pam, because there's no mystery; she's just like the boys who like her; mousy and shy. The ultimate emo-boy fantasy is to meet a nerdy, cute girl just like him, and nobody else will realize she's pretty. And she'll melt when she sees his record collection because it's just like hers....and she'll never want to go out to a party for which he'll be forced to comb his hair, or buy grown-up shoes or tie a tie, or demonstrate a hearty handshake, or make eye contact, or relate to people who work in different fields, or to basically act like a man." -- Julie Klausner

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Robert Penn Warren
item.description: "For West is where we all plan to go some day. It is where you go when the land gives out and the old-field pines encroach. It is where you go when you get the letter saying: Flee, all is discovered. It is where you go when you look down at the blade in your hand and the blood on it. It is where you go when you are told that you are a bubble on the tide of empire. It is where you go when you hear that thar's gold in them-thar hills. It is where you go to grow up with the country. It is where you go to spend your old age. Or it is just where you go." -- Robert Penn Warren

item.title: Shannon add a quote by George R.R. Martin
Shannon add a quote by Maria Montessori
item.description: "Our care of the child should be governed, not by the desire to make him learn things, but by the endeavor always to keep burning within him that light which is called intelligence." -- Maria Montessori

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Lois Lowry
item.description: "It is very risky. But each time a child opens a book, he pushes open the gate that separates him from Elsewhere." -- Lois Lowry

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "Looks like somebody's got jungle fever.' 'That's not even the right kind of racist." -- Rainbow Rowell
